devdoc.author: Karen Suen
devdoc.details: In practice, this proxy contract should have "ownership" of the low level contracts to ensure only this contract can invoke their methods by manually implementing ownership checks or using the OpenZeppelin Ownable contract. To reduce gas cost, business logic is implemented in the client app. This proxy contract can be replaced to support upgradability without losing the current data stored in the contract which is maintained by MarketStore and Escrow. Listings are never removed, use INACTIVE state to disable listings.

buyListing(uint256).details: Sender of this function purchases the given listing and sends the correct amount of funds to be held in escrow. This function assumes the correct amount of funds are sent and the listing exists so safety checks should be implemented by the client app.

params._listingId: The listing id to purchase with funds

confirmItemReceived(uint256).details: Updates a transaction to confirmed status, triggering release of buyer's purchase funds to the seller and completing the trade.

params._transactionId: The id of listing to update

constructor.details: Constructor initialises instances of low-level storage contracts for this proxy contract using the given contract addresses.

createListing(uint256,string,string,stri.details: Create a new listing in the marketplace and notifies client with the new listing id through event. Sender of this function is assumed to be the seller of the listing.

params._image: The reference for accessing the image from a distributed database
params._title: The title of the listing and item for sale

disableListing(uint256).details: Updates a listing to disabled status to indicate it is no longer available for sale.

params._listingId: The id of listing to update

getAllSellerListings(address).details: Returns a list of all listings created by the given address

params._seller: User address to get all listings for

getAllUserTransactionIds(address).details: Returns a list of all transaction ids involving the given user address

getListing(uint256).details: Returns all information about as a tuple. Note, the listing status is returned as an integer: 0 = AVAILABLE, 1 = SOLD, 2 = INACTIVE

getListingDescription(uint256).details: Returns the reference to the description of the given listing id stored in a distributed database.

getListingImage(uint256).details: Returns the reference to the image of the given listing id stored in a distributed database.

getListingPrice(uint256).details: Returns the selling price of the given listing id.

getListingSeller(uint256).details: Returns the seller address of the given listing id.

getListingStatus(uint256).details: Returns the status of a listing as an integer: 0 = AVAILABLE, 1 = SOLD, 2 = INACTIVE

getListingTitle(uint256).details: Returns the title of the given listing id.

getTotalListings().details: Returns the total number of listings ever stored in the marketplace

getTransaction(uint256).details: Returns all information about a transaction as a tuple. Note, the transaction status is returned as an integer: 0 = AWAITING_PAYMENT, 1 = AWAITING_DELIVERY, 2 = CONFIRMED

getTransactionAmount(uint256).details: Returns the amount of funds (to be) held in escrow of the given transaction id

getTransactionBuyer(uint256).details: Returns the buyer address of the given transaction id

getTransactionSeller(uint256).details: Returns the seller address of the given transaction id

getTransactionStatus(uint256).details: Returns the status of the given transaction id as an integer: 0 = AWAITING_PAYMENT, 1 = AWAITING_DELIVERY, 2 = CONFIRMED

devdoc.title: A proxy contract for interacting with low-level contracts.

userdoc.notice: All client interactions should use this contract to modify the state of the marketplace (create, access, modify listings and transactions)
